title: OTel guide isn't working
body:
### Describe the bug

OpenTelemetry guide - https://quarkus.io/guides/opentelemetry isn't working anymore. I verified on two different systems but both with Fedora 34 and thus relied on Podman which might be the cause. But of course might be also a change in the otel image latest versions. But in every case, I think we should fix this. 

The issue is that OTLP gRPC receiver from `otel/opentelemetry-collector:latest` is started for me only on port 4317 but the configuration points to the alternative port 55680 which my app isn't able to access. The fix was straightforward just change the port to 4317 in config and expose it in docker-compose.yml. I will create a PR with this change if nobody objects.

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_
